item.title: Good Reads Collection
item.description: Good Reads Collection Collecting good articles that I found over the period of time and small summaries about them. Imposter Syndrome @ Amazon In this article, an Amazon employee confessed how he shouldn’t be hired at Amazon in the first place.

item.title: Blogging Begins!!
item.description: First Post So I have been trying to start a blog for so long. Precisely 2 long years. Since I started working at Amazon.
AWS Workshops https://awesome-aws-workshops.com/ I’ll add the learnings and progress with each of the workshop here.
